prompt.task_guidelines: Given an online product title and description, predict the Dress or Skirt length of the Apparel product. Provide an answer ONLY from the following options: Mini, Knee-length, Midi, Maxi, Hi-Low. If you cannot determine the Dress or Skirt length from the product title or description, output N/A as the answer. Use the following format: answer. Categories: {labels}
prompt.output_guidelines: You will answer with just the the correct output label and nothing else.
